tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medical_team (
    team_id INT,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_leader VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    email_address VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE security_team (
    team_id INT,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_leader VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    email_address VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_plan (
    plan_id INT,
    plan_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    assigned_medical_team_id INT,
    assigned_security_team_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalTeam (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
  shift_start_time TIME,
  shift_end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityTeam (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
  shift_start_time TIME,
  shift_end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE EmergencyPlan (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_title VARCHAR(100),
  plan_description TEXT,
  plan_type ENUM('Medical', 'Security'),
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ContactInformation (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_id INT,
  contact_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_role VARCHAR(50),
  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES MedicalTeam(team_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalTeams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    team_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE SecurityTeams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    team_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Personnel (
    personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES MedicalTeams(team_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
